languages.text: {n}Одежда еретиков липнет к коже, словно жадная пиявка. Тело охватывают зуд и нездоровый жар, будто мерзость, жившая в душах прежних владельцев этих тряпок, пропитала их.{/n}
{n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одежда еретиков липнет к коже, словно жадная пиявка. Тело охватывают зуд и нездоровый жар, будто мерзость, жившая в душах прежних владельцев этих тряпок, пропитала их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The heretics' clothes cling to your skin like a greedy leech. A tingle and a morose fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearers' souls.{/n}

{n}The heretics' clothes cling to your skin like a greedy leech. A tingle and a morose fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearers' souls.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kleidung des Ketzers klebt an deiner Haut wie ein gieriger Blutegel. Ein Kribbeln und ein Fieber der Übellaunigkeit durchziehen deinen Körper, als seien diese Lumpen mit dem schändlichen Inhalt der Seelen ihrer ehemaligen Besitzer durchtränkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kleidung der Ketzer klebt an deiner Haut wie ein gieriger Blutegel. Ein Kribbeln und ein Fieber der Übellaunigkeit durchziehen deinen Körper, als seien diese Lumpen mit dem schändlichen Inhalt der Seelen ihrer ehemaligen Besitzer durchtränkt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les vêtements de l'hérétique vous collent à la peau, telles des sangsues affamées. Un picotement suivi d'une fièvre malsaine vous envahissent, comme si ces guenilles étaient imbibées de toute l'aura malfaisante de l'âme de leur ancien propriétaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les vêtements des hérétiques vous collent à la peau, telles des sangsues affamées. Un picotement suivi d'une fièvre vous envahissent, comme si ces guenilles étaient imbibées de toute l'aura malfaisante de l'âme de leurs anciens propriétaires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}异端分子的衣物像贪婪的水蛭一样粘在你的皮肤上，灼热而阴冷的刺痛传遍了你全身，仿佛这些破衣烂衫中蕴含着前任主人灵魂中的邪恶之物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异端分子的衣物像贪婪的水蛭一样粘在你的皮肤上，灼热而阴冷的刺痛传遍了你全身，仿佛这些破衣烂衫中蕴含着前任主人灵魂中的邪恶之物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端者の衣服が卑しいヒルのように肌に吸い付く。そのボロ着は元の持ち主の魂が持つ下劣な性格を吸い上げたように、ムズムズとした不快な熱が体に広がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異端者の衣服が卑しいヒルのように肌に吸い付く。そのボロ着は元の持ち主の魂が持つ下劣な性格を吸い上げたように、ムズムズとした不快な熱が体に広がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prenda del hereje se adhiere a tu piel como una sanguijuela codiciosa. Un cosquilleo y una fiebre atroz se extienden por tu cuerpo, como si estos harapos se hubieran impregnado del vil contenido de las almas de su antiguo portador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La ropa de los herejes se adhiere a tu piel como una sanguijuela codiciosa. Un cosquilleo y una fiebre sombría se extienden por tu cuerpo, como si estos harapos se hubieran impregnado del vil contenido de las almas de sus antiguos portadores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kâfirin kıyafeti, kana doymayan bir sülük gibi derine yapışıyor. Eski sahibinin ruhundaki tüm habisliği âdeta emmiş olan bu paçavra, tüm bedenine nahoş bir karıncalanma ve hummanın yayılmasına neden oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic's garb clings to your skin like a greedy leech. Tingling and foul fever spread over your body, as though these tatters have imbibed the vile contents of their former wearer's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kâfirin kıyafeti, kana doymayan bir sülük gibi derine yapışıyor. Eski sahibinin ruhundaki tüm adiliğin âdeta içine işlediği bu paçavra, karıncalanmana ve bedenini nahoş bir ateşin kaplamasına neden oluyor.{/n}
